name: Feature Request
about: Suggest a new feature or enhancement
title: '[Feature] '
labels: enhancement
assignees: ''
---

## Problem

Describe the problem this feature would solve. What use case does it address?

## Proposed Solution

A clear description of the feature you'd like to see implemented.

## Alternatives Considered

Have you considered any alternative solutions or workarounds?

## Additional Context

Any other context, mockups, or examples that help explain the feature.
